main.node: Function to get the splitted grn
Function to return updated inventory stock
Function to update grn in vpanel
Function to update grn in mozart

nodes.name: Function to get the splitted grn

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipment_items?filter={"_and": [{"sdm_shipments_id":{"invoice_number":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["vendor_invoice"]}}"}}},{"sdm_po_items_id":{"product":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["product"]}}"}}},{"sdm_shipments_id":{"vendor_po_num":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["vendor_po"]}}"}}}]}

={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipment_items/{{$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["id"]}}?fields= *,sdm_shipments_id.*,sdm_shipments_id.shipment_items.*

parameter.name: received_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "received"?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["received_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["received_qty"]}}

parameter.name: accepted_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "accepted"?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["accepted_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["accepted_qty"]}}

parameter.name: rejected_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "rejected"?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["rejected_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["rejected_qty"]}}

parameter.name: grn_status
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "accepted" && $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["accepted_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["qty"])>=$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["shipment_qty"]?"grn_accepted":$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "rejected" && $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["rejected_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["qty"])>=$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["shipment_qty"]?"grn_rejected":$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "received"?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["grn_status"]:$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "rejected" && $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["rejected_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["qty"])<$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["shipment_qty"]?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["grn_status"]:"grn_partially_accepted"}}

parameter.name: remaining_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["movement_type"] == "accepted"?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["remaining_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["remaining_qty"]}}

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_inventory?filter={"product":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get product ids"].json["productIds"]}}"}}

nodes.name: Function to return updated inventory stock

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to return updated inventory stock"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_inventory/{{$node["Function to return updated inventory stock"].json["id"]}}
={{$node["Function to update grn in mozart"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipments/{{$node["Function to update grn in mozart"].json["id"]}}

nodes.name: Function to update grn in vpanel

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["vendor_url"]}}/items/sdv_shipment_items?filter={"_and": [{"sdv_shipments_id":{"invoice_number":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["invoice_number"]}}"}}},{"sdv_vendor_pos_sdv_products_id":{"po_items_id":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["sdm_po_items_id"]}}"}}}]}
={{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["vendor_url"]}}/items/sdv_shipment_items/{{$node["Get the shipmentItem from vpanel"].json["data"][0]["id"]}}

parameters.functionCode:
let returnItems = $node["Function to get vendor invoices"].json["returnItems"];

return returnItems

nodes.name: Function to update grn in mozart
